description: Styling rules for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including variables for color themes, game layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Container for the entire game area, styled with margins and padding.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Class for displaying the game status, with specific font size and color.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout for the game board using CSS grid.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares in the game board.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Flexbox container for button controls of the game.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Base class for buttons, defining padding, borders, and transitions.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including alignment and background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application, including layout and transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for toggling theme, with specific positioning and transitions.
